医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
饮食会影响多发性硬化症的发病吗？最近使用英国生物银行数据进行的一项研究表明，健康饮食，包括适量的多脂鱼和饮酒，可以降低多发性硬化症 (MS) 发病的风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240605/Does-diet-influence-the-onset-of-multiple-sclerosis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240605/Does-diet-influence-the-onset-of-multiple-sclerosis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9234a44c-6281-41e4-899c-6fc5362688f6 Wed, 05 Jun 2024 20:49:00 -0400 Does diet influence the onset of multiple sclerosis?
蛋白质组健康评分彻底改变了疾病预测和个性化锻炼计划研究建立了蛋白质组 CRF 评分，将其与死亡率和多系统疾病风险的改进预测联系起来，显示了对运动训练的动态反应。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240605/Proteomic-fitness-scores-revolutionize-disease-prediction-and-personalized-exercise-plans.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240605/Proteomic-fitness-scores-revolutionize-disease-prediction-and-personalized-exercise-plans.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a317e7c1-ff37-4032-b0ad-4047b52392b9 Wed, 05 Jun 2024 20:33:00 -0400 Proteomic fitness scores revolutionize disease prediction and personalized exercise plans
钠摄入过多可能会增加湿疹发作的风险加州大学旧金山分校的研究发现，每日盐摄入量的变化可能解释湿疹发作。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240605/Excess-sodium-intake-may-increase-the-risk-of-eczema-flares.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240605/Excess-sodium-intake-may-increase-the-risk-of-eczema-flares.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=399595ad-1fde-4b5f-b3fd-7b5c319e0ce4 Wed, 05 Jun 2024 14:45:28 -0400 Excess sodium intake may increase the risk of eczema flares
关于父亲受孕前饮食如何影响孩子健康的新见解亥姆霍兹慕尼黑和德国糖尿病研究中心最近进行的一项研究为父亲的饮食和超重如何影响孩子的健康（甚至在受孕前）提供了新的见解。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240605/New-insights-into-how-fathers-diet-before-conception-can-affect-childrens-health.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240605/New-insights-into-how-fathers-diet-before-conception-can-affect-childrens-health.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=df0e970a-109e-4a3a-a654-6f8d6cff5a94 Wed, 05 Jun 2024 14:40:06 -0400 New insights into how fathers' diet before conception can affect children's health
血压升高和动脉硬化与青少年认知功能较差有关根据芬兰于韦斯屈莱大学和东芬兰大学最近进行的一项研究，血压升高和动脉硬化的青少年可能会出现认知功能较差的情况。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240605/Elevated-blood-Pressure-and-arterial-stiffness-linked-to-poorer-cognitive-function-in-adolescents.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240605/Elevated-blood-Pressure-and-arterial-stiffness-linked-to-poorer-cognitive-function-in-adolescents.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e3331a85-ef21-40cd-b5a6-c7e7e93bc1cb Wed, 05 Jun 2024 14:32:00 -0400 Elevated blood pressure and arterial stiffness linked to poorer cognitive function in adolescents
新的双边基因疗法在治疗遗传性听力损失方面显示出有希望的结果一种针对遗传性耳聋的新型基因疗法使五名接受双耳治疗的儿童恢复了听力功能。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240605/New-bilingual-gene-therapy-shows-promising-results-in-treating-genic-hearing-loss.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240605/New-bilingual-gene-therapy-shows-promising-results-in-treating-genic-hearing-loss.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=045bc1bb-5257-4e5c-aacd-01dc8e3f8f43 Wed, 05 Jun 2024 14:23:52 -0400 New bilateral gene therapy shows promising results in treating genetic hearing loss
新的人工智能相机技术可以为快速评估感染严重程度提供未来的工具或许很快就可以通过扫描患者的面部来测量患者的脉搏、呼吸和血压。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240605/New-AI-camera-technology-could-offer-a-future-tool-for-quickly-assessing-the-severity-of-infections.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240605/New-AI-camera-technology-could-offer-a-future-tool-for-quickly-assessing-the-severity-of-infections.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3869c597-a0bd-4205-993b-d7bf64f2b497 Wed, 05 Jun 2024 14:18:22 -0400 New AI camera technology could offer a future tool for quickly assessing the severity of infections
研究发现 JUN 蛋白可以减缓前列腺癌的生长随着前列腺癌的进展，它变得越来越具有侵袭性并且可以转移。这种形式的肿瘤很难治疗，这反映在高死亡率上：在世界范围内，前列腺恶性疾病是男性癌症死亡的第二大常见原因。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240605/JUN- Protein-could-slow-prostate-cancer-growth-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240605/JUN- Protein-could-slow-prostate-cancer-growth-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f0c5e97c-d735-418e-83ed-d9d4509fd01f Wed, 05 Jun 2024 08:12:00 -0400 JUN protein could slow prostate cancer growth, study finds
研究揭示了不宁腿综合症病因的遗传线索科学家们发现了不宁腿综合症病因的遗传线索，这种综合症在老年人中很常见。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240605/Study-uncovers-genic-clues-to-the-cause-of-restless-leg-syndrome.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240605/Study-uncovers-genic-clues-to-the-cause-of-restless-leg-syndrome.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=891ad72f-c57d-4f95-87e4-53c9e8f328e8 Wed, 05 Jun 2024 07:43:42 -0400 Study uncovers genetic clues to the cause of restless leg syndrome
非营利组织的卫生工作者？新的竞业禁止合同禁令可能对您没有帮助许多医生和护士对联邦贸易委员会禁止在雇佣合同中使用竞业禁止协议的新规定感到高兴。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240605/Health-worker-for-a-nonprofit-The-new-ban-on-noncompete-contracts-may-not-help-you.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240605/Health-worker-for-a-nonprofit-The-new-ban-on-noncompete-contracts-may-not-help-you.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4fc05bb2-9dfd-40a2-ad82-7e7d177c5a1f Wed, 05 Jun 2024 07:37:12 -0400 Health worker for a nonprofit? The new ban on noncompete contracts may not help you
